entry.title: Kazakhstanโs president pledges deeper ties with Armenia on official visit

media:group.media:title: Kazakhstanโs president pledges deeper ties with Armenia on official visit
media:group.media:description:
๐ Kazakhstanโs president says the country is seeking to deepen ties with Armenia and stands ready to help mediate between Yerevan and Baku. ๐ Armenia dismissed reporting by The Times newspaper suggesting the country is in talks with the United Kingdom to reach a cash-for-refugees arrangement. ๐ Armenia said there are no indications that a car accident late last week that left at least four soldiers dead was caused by cross-border shelling from Azerbaijan. ๐ Armenia has called for restraint after Iranโs direct attack on Israel over the weekend.

ิปึีกีถีซ ึ ิปีฝึีกีตีฅีฌีซ ีดีซีปึ ีฌีธึึีป ีกีผีณีกีฏีกีฟีดีกีถ ีกีผีชีกีดีกีถีกีฏีตีก ีฏีกีถีญีธึีดีจ ีฌีกึีพีกีฎีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีกีถีฐีฅีฟีกึีธึีด ีนีซ ีฅีถีฉีกีคึีธึีด, ีกีฝีธึีด ีง ีฟีกึีกีฎีกีทึีปีกีถีกีตีซีถ ีฐีกึึีฅึีซ ึีธึีฑีกีฃีฅีฟ ิฑึีดีฅีถ ีีฅีฟึีธีฝีตีกีถีจ ิณีฅีธึีฃีซ ีีซึีฆีกีขีฅีฏีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีดึ ีีก ีฏีกึีฎีธึีด ีง, ีธึ ิปีฝึีกีตีฅีฌีจ ีฐีฅีผีกีถีฏีกึีธึีด ีฏีกึีธีฒ ีง ีฃีธึีฎีธีฒีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีกีถึีถีฅีฌ ิปึีกีถีซ ีคีฅีดึ ีีฅีฟึีธีฝีตีกีถีจ ีดีกีถึีกีดีกีฝีถีธึีด ีง, ีฉีฅ ิปึีกีถีจ ึ ีคีกีตีซีถ ีฐีกึีพีกีฎีถีฅึีซ ีดีซีปีธึีธีพ ีซีถีน ีญีถีคีซึีถีฅึ ีฌีธึีฎีฅึ ึ ีกีถีคึีกีคีกีผีถีธึีด ีกีตีถ ีทีกีฐีกึีฏีธึีดีถีฅึีซีถ, ีฉีฅ ิปึีกีถีซ ีบีกีฟีกีฝีญีกีถ ีฃีธึีฎีธีฒีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ยซีขีฅีดีกีฏีกีถีกึีพีกีฎยป ีงึึ

media:group.media:description:
ิปึีกีถีถ ีกีผีกีปีซีถ ีกีถีฃีกีด ีธึีฒีซีฒ ีฐีกึีพีกีฎีฅึ ิปีฝึีกีตีฅีฌีซีถ, ีซีถีนีจ ีบีกีตีฉีตีธึีถีกีพีฟีกีถีฃ ีซึีกีพีซีณีกีฏ ีง ีฝีฟีฅีฒีฎีธึีด ีีฅึีฑีกีพีธึ ิฑึึีฅีฌึีซ ีฐีกีดีกึ. ีถีทีธึีด ีง ีกึึีฅีฌีกีฃีฅีฟ ิณีฅีธึีฃีซ ีีซีฆีกีขีฅีฏีตีกีถีจ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิฑึีทีกีฌีธึีตีฝ ีีฒีคีฅีฝีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด: ีึีก ีญีธีฝึีธีพี ิปึีกีถีจ ีทีกีฐีกีฃึีฃีผีพีกีฎ ีนีง ีบีกีฟีฅึีกีฆีดีซ ีจีถีคีฌีกีตีถีดีกีดีข, ึ ีฐีกึีพีกีฎีถ ิปีฝึีกีตีฅีฌีซีถ ีบีฅีฟึ ีง ีฐีกีดีกึีฅีฌ ีธึีบีฅีฝ ีฐีฅีฒีซีถีกีฏีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีบีกีฐีฅีฌีธึ ีฐีกีดีกึ ีฝีฟีซีบีพีกีฎ ีกึีพีกีฎ ึีกีตีฌ: ีีซึีฆีกีขีฅีฏีตีกีถีซ ีฏีกึีฎีซึีธีพี ีีฅึีฑีกีพีธึ ิฑึึีฅีฌึีซ ีบีกีตีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีฏีกึีธีฒ ีง ีกีถีพีฟีกีถีฃีกีตีซีถ ีผีซีฝีฏีฅึ ีฝีฟีฅีฒีฎีฅีฌ ีีกึีกีพีกีตีซีถ ิฟีธีพีฏีกีฝีซ ีฐีกีดีกึ:

media:group.media:description:
๐ In a rare admission of fault, Armeniaโs National Security Service said an Armenian soldier broke protocol and crossed the border with Azerbaijan, resulting in an incident earlier this week that left one Azerbaijani soldier wounded. ๐ Armeniaโs parliament today gave final approval to a package of amendments and additions meant to strengthen the countryโs domestic violence laws and extend protection for unmarried partners. ๐ Deputy Foreign Minister Vahan Kostanyan expressed the Armenian government's concern with the ongoing property crisis in Jerusalem's Armenian Quarter, saying that there is an attempt underway to change the status quo. ๐ Interview: โWe are here to stay,โ pledge Jerusalemโs Armenians, as land conflict escalates- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4gHgCdhhf-I ๐ Watch More: Simulated Mars mission brings Armenia one step closer to space- https://youtu.be/WBwtSdFVpV8

entry.title: Simulated Mars mission brings Armenia one step closer to space

media:group.media:title: Simulated Mars mission brings Armenia one step closer to space
media:group.media:description:
AMADEE-24, a month-long analog training mission for a future journey to Mars, wrapped up earlier this month in Armeniaโs central Ararat region. Managed by the Austrian Space Forum, the mission brought six analog astronauts to Armenia to carry out an array of experiments, backed by hundreds of researchers and staff from more than two dozen countries. Participants told CivilNet the mission has been a catalyst for Armeniaโs burgeoning domestic space industry, which is now setting its sights on producing its own spacesuits, supporting its own analog astronauts, and setting up the regionโs first space laboratory.
Credits: OeWF/vog.photo
